idea:
"Drillcotec Engineering Services Private Limited," is a trusted Operations Management and contracting company offering a one stop shop solution to "Quarrying, Crushing of Aggregates, Sand & Fly ash Business and Underground Mining or Tunneling Services". We offer our services for business Development, Quarrying Contracts, Operation & Maintenanc"Drillcotec Engineering Services Pvt Ltd," is a trusted Operations Management company offering a one stop shop solution to "Quarrying, Crushing of Aggregates, Sand & Fly ash Business and Underground Mining or Tunneling Services". We offer our services for business Development, Quarrying Contracts, Operation & Maintenance, Rock breaking or Splitting, Rock Anchoring & Grouting, Machine hiring, Drilling & Blasting in Tunnels, Project Management and an outsourcing partnership. 

Our TEAM consists of a top-notch professional from Aggregates, Sand, Concrete & Fly ash industry, who have spent many years in various functions & at all levels with well reputed companies like Ambuja Cement, ACC, Ultra-tech, RMC India, L&T, Sandvik, Robo Silicon, Gammon India Ltd, Dodsal, RMC Readymix (India) etc.

About Our Core Services 

 We are working as an operating partner for Quarry & Crushing operations for Infra, Aggregate & Sand projects. We are involved in Operations Management as under:

• Controlled blasting services.

• Drilling, Blasting, loading & transportation activities in Stone as well as minerals mine.

• Operations & Maintenance of crushing & screening plants.

• Rock breaking or Splitting by chemical / hydraulic rock splitter.

• Micropiling

• Rock Anchoring & Steel bar grouting. 

• Drilling & Blasting in Tunnels

• Machine hiring – Drill machine & compressors.
name: DRILLCOTEC ENGINEERING SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
• All About us.

Your business is our business. We believe in making your dreams and goals a reality and our

experts know just how to do that.We're prepared to help you at any level, from impartial advice

or practical assistance to help you make the most o f every opportunity.

• The Technical Stuff :

Whether you're just starting out or looking to restructure we've got you covered. Our mantra is:

analyze, identify, advise, execute. Our mission is to create relationships, not transactions. Our

promise is that we'll be there, as questions or issues arise, every step of the way.

• Our Expertise :

We're a group of accountants, analysts, advocates and strategists that thrive on sharing our

experience and knowledge to help you make a success of your business. Our track record

proves that clear communication and expert collaboration will boost your bottom line.
